name: a02991ea-e7f5-5530-9531-5485f6e18da3
notes: WCRFT is a morphosyntactic tagger for Polish. The tagger brings together Conditional Random Fields (CRF) and tiered tagging. The code is written in C++ and uses following components: CRF++ classifier, WCCL: formalism for morphosyntactic feature generation (and its implementation), corpus2: a library for rapid NLP application development, supporting positional tagsets.
title: WCRFT - Wrocław CRF Tagger
